Equation: [c] : h + mqn6 + nadph --> mql6 + nadp

This enzyme can reduce either Ubiquinone or Menaquinone. Because no ubiquinone was found in Hpylori menaquinone 6 is used here. In the Kegg database, the NADPH Quinone Reductase catalyze an one electron reduction of quinones but in Wang and Maier, 2004, Infection and Immunity, they say that it is a two-electron transfere. Therefore no EC number is entered. IT (06-01-2004)

notes.html:p: Equation: [c] : adphep-DD + adphep-LD + adphep7p-LD + kdolipid4_HP + (2) udpg + udpgal --> (3) adp + core_lps_hp + (3) udp

TDV - IT (5-31-2004) Monteiro, Mario, 2000; Kadrmas, Julie, 1998 This rxn is guessed from the sugar core structure of Hpylori (Monteiro,M ,2000). It is not clear if glc and gal are added in their phosphorylated forms or not. The series of genes for this is RFA-. The removal of ADP is guessed from the Ecoli analogous rxn (Kadrmas) IT(06-03-2004) I changed glc-D, gal to udpgal and udpg. (based on Kadrmas, 1998)
